tasks.label: ssh backend git status
args: cd /root/ganbayar_trading_bot; git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree; git status -sb; git log -1 --oneline

tasks.label: inspect docker-compose.yml
args: cd /root/ganbayar_trading_bot; wc -l docker-compose.yml; nl -ba docker-compose.yml | head -n 220

tasks.label: show compose numbered
args: cd /root; wc -l docker-compose.yml; awk 'NR<=60{print NR":"$0}' docker-compose.yml

tasks.label: restart backend container
args: docker restart jkm_bot_backend; docker ps --format 'table {{.Names}}	{{.Status}}	{{.Ports}}' | grep -E 'jkm_bot_backend|NAMES'

tasks.label: verify default strategy inside container
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend python3 -c "from core.user_strategies_store import load_user_strategies; import os; os.environ['USER_STRATEGIES_PROVIDER']='dashboard'; os.environ['JKM_PRIVACY_MODE']='1'; s=load_user_strategies('any_user'); print('count',len(s)); print('first_id', (s[0].get('strategy_id') if s else None))"

tasks.label: rebuild and recreate backend via compose
copy env and compose up
args: cp -n /root/ganbayar_trading_bot/.env /root/.env || true; cd /root; docker compose up -d --build

tasks.label: show /root/docker-compose.yml top
args:
python3 -c "from pathlib import Path; p=Path('/root/docker-compose.yml'); s=p.read_text(encoding='utf-8', errors='replace').splitlines(); print('LINES',len(s));
print('\\n'.join([f'{i+1}: {s[i]}' for i in range(min(80,len(s))) ]))"

tasks.label: show compose top no single quotes
args: python3 -c "from pathlib import Path; s=Path(\"/root/docker-compose.yml\").read_text(encoding=\"utf-8\", errors=\"replace\").splitlines(); print(\"LINES\",len(s)); print(\"\\n\".join([f\"{i+1}: {s[i]}\" for i in range(min(80,len(s))) ]))"

tasks.label: ssh show container dashboard env
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend sh -lc 'printenv | grep -E "DASHBOARD|NEXTAUTH_URL|APP_URL|BASE_URL|FRONTEND" | sort || true'

tasks.label: deploy backend
args: cd /opt/JKM-AI-BOT && docker compose up -d --build backend 2>&1 | tail -40

tasks.label: rebuild backend v2
args: cd /opt/JKM-AI-BOT && docker compose up -d --build backend 2>&1 | tail -20

tasks.label: check inside container
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend grep -n requestId /opt/bot/core/simulator_v2.py | head -3

tasks.label: check container /app/core
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend grep -n requestId /app/core/simulator_v2.py | head -3

tasks.label: check meta response
args: cd /opt/JKM-AI-BOT && curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/api/strategy-sim/run -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"detectors":["FAIR_VALUE_GAP"],"symbols":["AUDJPY"],"from":"2025-10-01","to":"2026-01-17","slPips":30,"tpRatio":2,"riskPercent":1}' | python3 -c 'import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print(json.dumps(d.get("meta",{}), indent=2))'

tasks.label: run test inside container
args: docker cp /tmp/test_inside_container.py jkm_bot_backend:/app/ && docker exec jkm_bot_backend python /app/test_inside_container.py 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: check SimulatorV2Request class
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend grep -A20 'class SimulatorV2Request' /app/core/simulator_v2.py | head -25

tasks.label: find SimulatorV2Request
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend grep -n SimulatorV2Request /app/core/simulator_v2.py | head -5

tasks.label: run test inside2
args: docker cp /tmp/test_inside_container2.py jkm_bot_backend:/app/ && docker exec jkm_bot_backend python /app/test_inside_container2.py 2>&1 | tail -40

tasks.label: run test with timeout
args: timeout 60 docker exec jkm_bot_backend python /app/test_inside_container2.py 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: run test with file output
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend sh -c 'cd /app && python test_inside_container2.py > /tmp/result.txt 2>&1; cat /tmp/result.txt | tail -30'

tasks.label: quick meta test python
args: cd /opt/JKM-AI-BOT && python3 -c "import requests; r=requests.post('http://localhost:8000/api/strategy-sim/run', json={'detectors':['FAIR_VALUE_GAP'],'symbols':['AUDJPY'],'from':'2025-10-01','to':'2026-01-17','slPips':30,'tpRatio':2,'riskPercent':1}); print('META:', r.json().get('meta',{}).keys()); print('STATS:', r.json().get('stats')); print('EXPLAIN:', list(r.json().get('explainability',{}).keys()) if r.json().get('explainability') else None)"

tasks.label: wait and check process
args: sleep 60 && ps aux | grep test_multi_mode | head -2

tasks.label: check still running
args: ps aux | grep test_multi | grep -v grep | head -2

tasks.label: check test_quick process
args: ps aux | grep test_quick | grep -v grep

tasks.label: run and wait for result
args: cd /opt/JKM-AI-BOT && timeout 180 python3 test_to_file.py; cat /tmp/sim_result.json 2>/dev/null | head -80

tasks.label: container processes
args: docker exec jkm_bot_backend ps aux | head -20

tasks.label: contract version
args: curl -s http://localhost:8000/api/simulator/contract 2>&1 | python3 -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print('version:', d.get('version')); print('rootCauseTaxonomy:', d.get('rootCauseTaxonomy'))"

tasks.label: step0 sanity
args: set -e; cd /opt/JKM-AI-BOT; docker ps --format 'table {{.Names}}\t{{.Status}}' | sed -n '1,20p'; docker exec jkm_bot_backend sh -lc 'python3 -V; ls -la /app/core | head'

tasks.label: force recreate backend
args: docker rm -f jkm_bot_backend && cd /root && docker compose up -d --build 2>&1 | tail -20

tasks.label: check import errors
args: ssh root@159.65.11.255 "docker logs jkm_bot_backend 2>&1 | grep -i 'error\|import\|signals' | head -20"

tasks.label: check for errors
args: docker logs jkm_bot_backend 2>&1 | grep -i error | head -20

tasks.label: fix signals v2
args: scp 'c:\Users\Kamna\OneDrive\Desktop\ganbayar_trading_bot\fix_signals_router_v2.py' root@159.65.11.255:/opt/JKM-AI-BOT/ && ssh root@159.65.11.255 'cd /opt/JKM-AI-BOT && python3 fix_signals_router_v2.py'

tasks.label: rebuild backend final
args: docker rm -f jkm_bot_backend; cd /root && docker compose up -d --build 2>&1 | tail -20

tasks.label: rebuild correct context
args: docker rm -f jkm_bot_backend; cd /root && docker compose up -d --build 2>&1 | tail -15

tasks.label: final rebuild
args: docker rm -f jkm_bot_backend; cd /root && docker compose up -d --build 2>&1 | tail -10

tasks.label: full endpoint test
args: echo '=== SCAN STATUS ===' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/scan/status && echo '' && echo '=== SIGNALS ===' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/signals && echo '' && echo '=== SIGNALS STATS ===' && curl -s http://localhost:8000/signals/stats

tasks.label: start scan via script
args: echo 'curl -s -X POST http://localhost:8000/scan/start -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"strategyId\":\"test-247\",\"timeframes\":[\"5m\"]}"' > /tmp/test_scan.sh && chmod +x /tmp/test_scan.sh && bash /tmp/test_scan.sh
